Package courses

Class courseIO

java.lang.Object
displayIO.IO
courses.courseIO
public class courseIO
extends IO
Class to store and retrieve Course data from a binary file course.bin
Author:
Abhinaya

    • checkCourseCode

      public static boolean checkCourseCode​(java.lang.String code)
      Method to check whether the course code passed as a parameter already exists in the file
      Parameters:
      code - Course code
      Returns:
      true if the course code already exists

    • checkCourseIndex

      public static boolean checkCourseIndex​(java.lang.String courseIndex)
      Method to check whether the Index passed as a parameter exists in the file
      Parameters:
      courseIndex - Index to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the index exists

    • editCourse

      public static void editCourse()
      Method to edit Course data already stored in the file

    • returnCourse

      public static Course returnCourse​(java.lang.String code)
      Method to return a Course object associated with the Course Code passed as a parameter
      Parameters:
      code - Course Code
      Returns:
      A course object if the course code is found in the file, otherwise null

    • returnAllCourses

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Course> returnAllCourses()
      Method to return a list of all the courses stored in the file
      Returns:
      A list of existing courses

    • returnIndex

      public static Index returnIndex​(java.lang.String index)
      Method to return the Index object associated with the passed Index number
      Parameters:
      index - Index Number of the Index object to be extracted
      Returns:
      An Index object if the Index number is found, otherwise null

    • returnAllIndexes

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Index> returnAllIndexes()

      Returns:
      A list of existing indexes
